548"B" is the SIX (6) Credit Major Essay option for Master of Forestry (MF) students - new students must be pre-approved by the Forestry graduate program office to register for this 6-credit essay.
This is the SIX (6) CREDIT major essay for MF students completing their program by the end of TERM ONE.
SIX (6) CREDIT Major Essay for Master of Forestry (MF) students beginning their program in January 2010.
